programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep359360
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2113
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep983
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: The White Storm 3 Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Billy works undercover in Suchat's drug cartel, while another undercover cop Wing successfully earns their trust in an incident and a brotherly bond is built among the three. When the police busts the syndicate, Suchat flees to the Golden Triangle with Billy and receives a tip-off about the betrayal within his circle of trust

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: A wealthy entrepreneur goes undercover with an Interpol agent to protect a new invention, the Seed of God, from falling into an international crime conglomerate.

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Mobster Sing aspires to join the Axe Gang. As he stumbles into a slum ruled by eccentric landlords that are kung fu masters in disguise, his actions cause the gang and the landlords to engage in an explosive kung fu battle

programme.title: One and Only
programme.desc: Veteran street dancer Ding Lei, invites passionate street dancer, Chen Shuo to his dance club. Sparks fly when Chen dances with the clubs top dancers. Chen pursues his dream to perform but discovers that Ding has invited him for another reason. As both of them deal with hard times, can they turn the tide on the challenges that they are facing?

programme.title: 72 Tenants of Prosperity
programme.desc: Ha Kung and Shek Kin are sworn brothers, but become sworn enemies in business and every aspect of life after Pinky, the girl they love, marries Ha Kung. It is only when the property owner of both their shops wants to terminate their tenancies forty years later, that they are able to resolve the rivalry.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his familys expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his familys reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: The film follows the love story of a university student, An Ran and a Taiwanese man, Qi Xiao. They met and fell in love at a concert by Chyi Chin, a Taiwanese singer, in Beijing in 1991. However, courage alone may not be enough for the lovers to stay together, and goodbyes may truly mean the end. Will An Ran and Qi Xiao meet again in 2019?

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Mobster Sing aspires to join the Axe Gang. As he stumbles into a slum ruled by eccentric landlords that are kung fu masters in disguise, his actions cause the gang and the landlords to engage in an explosive kung fu battle

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: God of Gamblers 2
programme.desc: A new chapter of the highly successful "God of Gamblers". The legend's disciple Andy Lau is now rising in the gambling world as the "Knight of Gamblers"; clashing with another gambling icon, the wild psychic Stephen Chow (aka "Saint of Gamblers") who wants to follow the God. They mix like oil and water in a series of tricks and mishaps, but are forced to join hands against their master's nemesis on the gambling table.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protg Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong 2013
programme.desc: Sung Chi Hung and Ha Shek Lam worked at a Chinese restaurant when they were young and both fell in love with the owners daughter, Yeung. Sung and Yeung eventually got married and took over the restaurant. Many years later, Sung meets Ha who is now a real estate tycoon and plans to buy out the restaurant. Can Sung save the restaurant?

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Evas mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mothers wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Evas heart?

programme.title: 3Ft Ball and Souls
programme.desc: Members of an internet suicide room called Life Club decide to end their lives using explosives. But every time the fireworks explode, they find themselves back-in-time before they carried out their plan. They suspect the cause of this mystery to be the young age of one of the members and tries to convince the high school girl to quit

programme.title: Phua Chu Kang: The Movie
programme.desc: Ah Ma visits Phua Chu Kang, who is now based in Malaysia, but soon goes missing. Phua desperately searches for Ah Ma and finds her in a nursing home run by Lim Lau Pek, who unexpectedly offers Phua a renovation job. When suspicious deaths start occurring in the nursing home, Lim becomes the prime suspect. How will Phua resolve this?

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: Tiger, Lambert and Skinny Pig are massive fans of the movie, Flirting Scholar. One day, Skinny Pig who is an obscure inventor, puts together a movie time machine and accidentally sucks all of them into the movie of Flirting Scholar. The trio head off to Wah mansion to meet the maid Autumn can they find her and can they return to the present?

programme.title: Fight Back to School II
programme.desc: Star Chow (Stephen Chow) is an officer in the Royal Hong Kong Police's elite Special Duties Unit (SDU). During a meeting with his senior officer, Inspector Yip (Deanie Ip), Star jokingly suggests he wish to be reassigned to the traffic unit. Star immediately finds himself demoted to Constable engaging in traffic duty on the streets of Hong Kong. After being made the scapegoat for a failed high school terrorist investigation, Star hastily resigns from the police. He decides to enroll at the high school to launch his own private investigation. But Star realises the investigation won't be easy when he discovers that the bumbling, incompetent CID detective Tat (Ng Man Tat) is also undercover at the high school.

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of Young and Dangerous, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: My Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a Korean movie, this is the love story of school swimmer Zhou Xiao Qi and a transfer student You Yong Ci. Zhou falls in love with You at first sight in high school but You leaves suddenly one day without saying goodbye. As fate brings them back together years later, can they get the spark back in their relationship?

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963 and ruthlessly built an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: Love Never Ends
programme.desc: An empty-nest elderly man and a widowed elderly woman who collects scrap, meet unexpectedly and gradually develop feelings for each other. An elderly couple whose wife suffers from a serious illness, makes a living by selling scrap. Both these elderly couples fall deeply in love and prove that love never ends, even if there is no tomorrow!

programme.title: The Killer Has No Return
programme.desc: Professional killer Lui goes to Malaysia after completing his mission of killing the big boss of a Hong Kong gang. His next target is a groom who is throwing his wedding banquet at a hotel in Chinatown. Just when Lui takes aim at his target, another victim instead of the groom is shot, and he becomes a scapegoat in this mystery assassination.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demons clutches.

programme.title: Killer Darts
programme.desc: A group of bandits raided the village where dart master Liu lives and killed his wife. While hunting them down, Lius disciple kills a farmer and his wife when she refuses his advances, leading Liu to adopt their orphaned daughter and raises her with his son. Years later, the daughter meets a man with the bandits and is tricked to go against Liu.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a Generals daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: Rendezvous With Death
programme.desc: Sun Chung had been recognized as an expert comedy and crime thriller director, but he was to gain even greater acclaim for his soulful, powerful, intelligent, and beautifully-made martial arts epics. This stands alongside The Deadly Breaking Sword and The Kung-fu Instructor as one of his very best. It's not so much the plot - a master swordsman protects a treasure chest on a dangerous journey - that makes this great, but what Sun does with it, inspiring the cast and crew to some of their finest work.

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Muis embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love

programme.title: The Lady Assassin
programme.desc: Two feuding princes fight for the throne in the Qing Dynasty, causing many injuries and deaths to the commoners. Can the lady assassin who is drawn into this royal feud execute her assassination mission in time to help one of the princes secure the throne?

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: 7-Man Army
programme.desc: This iconoclastic film retells the legend of seven Chinese patriots, who sacrificed their lives to defend against 20,000 Japanese soldiers and 50 tanks for 5 days, at a strategic key point of the Great Wall known as Pa Tou Lou Tzu.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, they are kept apart as she is engaged to another man. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Tang Peng Nan are a sweet couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan at a time when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he found that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: Legendary Weapons of China
programme.desc: Lei Kung, the leader of the Boxer Clan in Yunnan, dissolves the clan to save his disciples before going into self-exile. The Clan sends various assassins to kill him but failed. They then assigned Kungs brother Yong to find and kill Kung, leading to a battle between the two brothers.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fianc Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan

programme.title: Gambler's Delight
programme.desc: The Killer star Danny Lee plays the lead role of a guy who needs to become a hero. He lies, steals and cheats his way into operating a plush casino, but when he incurs the wrath of a female Japanese gang leader, all bets are off!

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yus beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Village of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sisters magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Ah Chiao, a village girl stranded in the city, befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are poor but happy, though Ah Chiaos fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she soon learns that money cannot buy one happiness...

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his fathers death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the Toad Stance and accidentally unveils his true identity

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: Pursuit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Kung Fu legend Ti Lung stars in the action movie as Fu Xue Hong, embarking on a epic journey of revenge for his father.

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charns beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dongs concubine as he knows Dongs adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: In the Yuan Dynasty, martial artists everywhere battle for the Heaven Sword and the Dragon Sabre, as only when these two powerful weapons combine can a secret be revealed to help one become the king of the martial arts world. As Zhang Wu Ji acquires the skills from Nine Yang Scriptures by chance, he is also embroiled in this lengthy battle.

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brothers Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang is trapped by seven seductive spiders, hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing have to fight with the spiders to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his masters rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gaos betrayal

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: All Men are Brothers
programme.desc: This is a sequel to Chang Chehs epic The Water Margin, and follows the patriotic story of seven warriors in the band of 108 outlaws at Mount Liang. The magnificent seven battle against the despotic government officials to save their country.

programme.title: Tales of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: Wits Of The Brats
programme.desc: Tou Kuan is a wealthy Kwangtung brat with a good kung fu background, he has only one ambition: to pit his wits against three shady masters of the North. The first, conman Che Tsai. The second, a professional romantic dubbed The Terrific. Terrific introduces Tou Kuan to his third rival, Thief Shih San-shou.

programme.title: Young Lovers
programme.desc: Guitar-playing rich kid, Yang Fan, heads to Japan to join a rock 'n' roll band where he soon finds himself competing for the affections of two beautiful girls.

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The film is about a Chinese martial arts school finds itself outclassed by their rivals, they hire elite ninja from Japan to destroy the school. The lone survivor of the massacre learns the secrets of ninjutsu and seeks revenge against the ninja.

programme.title: Ka Pe Ranasingam
programme.desc: Tamil political-drama movie, starring, Vijay Sethupathi, Aishwarya Rajesh, Munishkanth, and Vela Ramamoorthy

programme.title: Jai Hind 2
programme.desc: Tamil Action Film, Starring, Arjun, Surjeen Chawla

programme.desc: Tamil Romantic Film, Starring, Prithvi Rajan, Veena Nandhakumar, MS Kumaran and A Venkatesh

programme.desc: Tamil Family Drama, Starring, Umapathy Ramaiah, Mrudula Murali, Thambi Ramaiah

programme.desc: Tamil Romance Film, Starring, Teju Ashwini, Delhi Ganesh, Ashwin Kumar Lakshmikanthan, Avantika Mishra

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: Tamil Horror movie, Starring, Vimal Krishna Ashima Narwal Pavani Gangireddy Sritha Chandana Abhinav Gomatam Archana Atul Kulkarni Kabir Duhan Singh & Others

programme.title: Kirumi
programme.desc: Tamil Action Thriller Movie, Starring, Kathir, Reshmi Menon, Charle & Others. Kathir, a carefree young man, becomes a police informer like his neighbour Prabhakar, and begins to get too close with inspector Soundarapandian, despite the warnings of the latter. It is only when he tries to ride on an ego clash between Soundarapandian and Mathiarasu, a rival inspector, that he realizes he's become a pawn in a dangerous game

programme.desc: A prince and a commoner who are best friends keep having to thwart the plots of the prince's scheming, ambitious minister.

programme.title: Fauladi Policewala
programme.desc: Ibrahim, a police inspector, gets posted in a village with a very low crime rate. In pursuit of an adventurous life, he plans to obtain a transfer with the help of local thugs, but his plan backfires.

programme.title: Mr Joe B. Carvalho
programme.desc: A private detective is tasked by a businessman to find his daughter. However, while investigating, he gets involved with his former girlfriend, a policewoman who is chasing an international criminal.

programme.title: Soldier
programme.desc: After Major Vijay Malhotra's colleagues betray him, he is branded as a traitor and subsequently killed. But his son, Vicky, vows to take revenge on his father's murderers and prove his innocence.

programme.title: Pyar Ki Ladai
programme.desc: A jobless man spends his time doing unfruitful things, but his life changes when he falls in love with the sister of a sarpanch. However, to marry her, he must win a kabaddi match.

programme.title: Pyar Ki Ladai
programme.desc: A jobless man spends his time doing unfruitful things, but his life changes when he falls in love with the sister of a sarpanch. However, to marry her, he must win a kabaddi match.

programme.title: Cinebuzz
programme.desc: The host interviews several famous personalities, shares the latest news of the Bollywood industry and reviews the latest movies.

programme.title: Hum Kisise Kum Nahin
programme.desc: Munna Bhai, a gangster, meets Komal and instantly falls in love with her. In a bid to marry her, he must fight with Komal's elder brother, Dr Rastogi, and her lover, Raja.

programme.title: Awara Paagal Deewana
programme.desc: Dr Anmol, a dentist and henpecked husband, lives a miserable existence in New York due to his domineering wife. However, his troubles increase when he unwittingly gets embroiled in a mafia rivalry.

programme.title: Arjun Gowda
programme.desc: Arjun is a hot-headed young man who will do anything for the people he loves. When a figure from the underworld threatens his loved ones, he springs into action.

programme.title: Soldier
programme.desc: After Major Vijay Malhotra's colleagues betray him, he is branded as a traitor and subsequently killed. But his son, Vicky, vows to take revenge on his father's murderers and prove his innocence.

programme.title: Saheb Biwi Aur Gangster Returns
programme.desc: Aditya is trying to recover from his wife's betrayal and his physical disability. Meanwhile, Indrajeet Singh, a prince whose property was confiscated by Aditya's family, returns to exact revenge.

programme.title: Achanak
programme.desc: Arjun and his wife go on the run after she gets accused of murdering his brother. They must prove her innocence while trying to evade the police as well as the real criminals.

programme.title: Ek Aur Bol Bachchan
programme.desc: Rehman and his sister move to Bheemarajapuram, where a local landlord employs him at his house. He introduces himself as Ram but later has to face severe trouble to keep up this lie.

programme.title: Mirch Masala
programme.desc: A woman decides to fight against her powerful oppressor. When the guard of a chilli factory helps her, the women and the teacher of the village join them to openly defy the prevailing repression.

programme.title: Sergeant
programme.desc: A diligent police officer who loses his leg during a dangerous mission risks his life to solve a critical unresolved murder case.

programme.title: Beqabu
programme.desc: Raja helps imprison a terrorist who then murders him. Years later, Raja's girlfriend comes across his lookalike in Nepal and decides to find the truth.

programme.title: Beqabu
programme.desc: Raja helps imprison a terrorist who then murders him. Years later, Raja's girlfriend comes across his lookalike in Nepal and decides to find the truth.

programme.title: Dus
programme.desc: Jamwaal, a terrorist, plans to wreak havoc in Canada when the Indian Prime Minister visits the nation. However, a team of special agents from India are sent to catch the terrorist.

programme.title: ACP Shiva
programme.desc: Shivakumar, a dishonest cop, ensures that he is transferred to Chennai, where he exploits his position for financial gain. He also supports GK, a local MP, against the commissioner of Chennai.

programme.title: 777 Charlie
programme.desc: Dharma, a hopeless man, leads his life in ruins until an abused pup named Charlie walks in and changes it completely for good.

programme.title: Sergeant

programme.title: Alluri
programme.desc: Iqbal, a police candidate learns various lessons as he visits the different places where Alluri, another inspiring officer has discharged his duties and reduced all forms of corruption.

programme.title: I Am 24

programme.title: Mere Huzoor
programme.desc: Akhtar and Salim are both in love with Sultanat, but she chooses to marry Akhtar. When problems occur in their marriage, Salim marries her to save her image from being tarnished.

programme.title: Dil Vil Pyar Vyar
programme.desc: Dev, Vishal and Hrithik enter a singing competition. However, life is complicated for them as they face numerous obstacles in their personal lives which slowly bring out the best in them.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: A loud-mouth FBI agent goes undercover as a beauty contestant to capture a terrorist in this hilarious action-comedy.

programme.title: Malory Towers S1 Ep10
programme.desc: The Dress - When a beautiful dress arrives at Malory Towers, the girls are buzzing to realise there is a debutante in their midst, but who is it?

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Four zoo animals accidentally find themselves enroute to Africa, learning first-hand what life in the wild can be like in this animated family comedy.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Shiro Is The Super Hero - With the ordinary Nohara family, lives an ordinary dog, whose name is very ordinary, Shiro, a dog you might find anywhere. The one thing that isn't ordinary? He's a superhero!

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Bizarre Biscuit Factory - The Bobobobobone gives one the power to conquer the world. Shiro heads to the biscuit factory, where he finds himself fighting over the Bobobobobone with Deca.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Gem-Filled Jewelry Store - Shiro heads to a jewellery shop with tight security when he finds out that the Bobobobobone is there. Will he be able to get past the sensors to get to the Bobobobobone?

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Snatch The Egg! - Shiro and Deca fight on a balloon as they go in search of the Bobobobobone! Will Shiro be able to protect a heron's eggs from a violent Deca and finally acquire the Bobobobobone?

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Inside The Deep Deep Lake ... - Traces of the Bobobobobone are found in the Deep Deep Lake. Shiro dives into the lake, holding his breath but Deca interferes with his boat. Who is going to win?

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Summer Break Exercise - Traces of the Bobobobobone are found at a riverbed. As Shiro is about to jet out to the riverbed, his owner, Shin Chan, decides to take him for a walk.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Fun At The Museum - Shiro heads to a museum where he finds a dinosaur fossil! He can't find the Bobobobobone as there are too many bones. Will Shiro be able to get the Bobobobobone without being caught?

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Bouncy Bridge Rhapsody - Aura the fickle crow secretly eavesdrops on Shiro and Be-boo's conversation. Shiro heads to the river island of Kaskabe Canyon in Block 7 in search of the Bobobobobone.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep9
programme.desc: The Workaholic Ants - Shiro finds out that there are traces of the Bobobobobone in a park in District 9. He heads to the park using his Super Dash and finds an army of ants carrying the Bobobobobone.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Uncool Coldness - Shiro travels to a refrigerated warehouse. Deca, who is prepared for the cold, takes the lead. Shiro starts to get sleepy. Will he be able to find the Bobobobobone and escape?

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Follow The Balloons! - Traces of the Bobobobobone are found in a balloon shop. Shiro rushes to the scene but the balloon has flown away. He jumps onto Deca's drone and discovers a whole new world.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 Ep36
programme.desc: Omni-Tricked - Ben's holiday to Portland is cut short when he discovers an 11th alien while battling a Dr. Animo Mega-Creature and damages his Omnitrix in a fight.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Out To Launch - While on a visit to Cape Canaveral, the Tennyson Trio attends the inaugural launch of an experimental space plane. When Vilgax commandeers the ship, Ben must stop him from weaponising the shuttle.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry In New York S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Museum Peace / Here Kite-Y Kite-Y / Street Wise Guys / Chameleon Story - Jerry helps an elephant escape from the museum. Hi-flying hijinks ensue when Tom and Jerry take kites to the park and disrupt street performers throughout the city.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry In New York S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Telepathic Tabby / Shoe-In / It's A Gift / Stormin' The Doorman - In an attempt to trick Tom out of food, Butch predicts the future. Jerry helps save a shoe repair shop.

programme.title: Sesame Street S53 Ep21
programme.desc: Grouch-Ercise - Elmo, Abby, Grundgetta and Nina find exercises for unwell Oscar to do to feel better, but he feels good and rotten again after a long, grouchy walk.

programme.title: Sesame Street S53 Ep22
programme.desc: Monster Truckin - Elmo and Chris are making their own monster truck jump, but they dont have a ramp. What if they make a ramp out of a pizza box lid? Lets try!

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: En route to New York via a penguin-piloted plane, the animals crash land in the plains of Africa where a surprise awaits. Stars Ben Stiller and Chris Rock.

programme.title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
programme.desc: The gang of animals joins a travelling circus to get home to New York.

programme.desc: Bouncy Bridge Rhapsody - Aura the fickle crow secretly eavesdrops on Shiro and Be-boo's conversation. Shiro heads to the river island of Kaskabe Canyon in Block 7 in search of the Bobobobobone.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep9
programme.desc: The Workaholic Ants - Shiro finds out that there are traces of the Bobobobobone in a park in District 9. He heads to the park using his Super Dash and finds an army of ants carrying the Bobobobobone.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Uncool Coldness - Shiro travels to a refrigerated warehouse. Deca, who is prepared for the cold, takes the lead. Shiro starts to get sleepy. Will he be able to find the Bobobobobone and escape?

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Follow The Balloons! - Traces of the Bobobobobone are found in a balloon shop. Shiro rushes to the scene but the balloon has flown away. He jumps onto Deca's drone and discovers a whole new world.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 Ep36
programme.desc: Omni-Tricked - Ben's holiday to Portland is cut short when he discovers an 11th alien while battling a Dr. Animo Mega-Creature and damages his Omnitrix in a fight.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Out To Launch - While on a visit to Cape Canaveral, the Tennyson Trio attends the inaugural launch of an experimental space plane. When Vilgax commandeers the ship, Ben must stop him from weaponising the shuttle.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry In New York S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Museum Peace / Here Kite-Y Kite-Y / Street Wise Guys / Chameleon Story - Jerry helps an elephant escape from the museum. Hi-flying hijinks ensue when Tom and Jerry take kites to the park and disrupt street performers throughout the city.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry In New York S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Telepathic Tabby / Shoe-In / It's A Gift / Stormin' The Doorman - In an attempt to trick Tom out of food, Butch predicts the future. Jerry helps save a shoe repair shop.

programme.title: Sesame Street S53 Ep21
programme.desc: Grouch-Ercise - Elmo, Abby, Grundgetta and Nina find exercises for unwell Oscar to do to feel better, but he feels good and rotten again after a long, grouchy walk.

programme.title: Sesame Street S53 Ep22
programme.desc: Monster Truckin - Elmo and Chris are making their own monster truck jump, but they dont have a ramp. What if they make a ramp out of a pizza box lid? Lets try!

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: En route to New York via a penguin-piloted plane, the animals crash land in the plains of Africa where a surprise awaits. Stars Ben Stiller and Chris Rock.

programme.title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
programme.desc: The gang of animals joins a travelling circus to get home to New York.

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales For Every Child S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Beauty And The Beast - The Beast is an enchanted African prince with the voice of Gregory Hines in this version of the fairy tale.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep12
programme.desc: The Birth Of A Super Hero - Shiro finally finds the Bobobobobone. As he prepares to transfer it to the Space Headquarters, he reflects on the day he became a superhero. It was an ordinary sunny day

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep13
programme.desc: A Wild Can - Traces of the Bobobobobone are found at a can factory. Shiro wants to open a can to smell it but a hero shouldn't open one without permission. Deca starts opening cans carelessly.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Enchanting Cancan - This time, traces of the Bobobobobone are found in a pancake. While on his mission, Shiro's nose picks up a good scent. He is distracted by the smell and takes a detour.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep15
programme.desc: A Fun Day At The Bowling Center - One of the pins at the bowling alley is the Bobobobobone. Shiro wants to play, but he has bigger responsibilities. Deca arrives and throws Shiro like a bowling ball.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Umbrellas Are Easily - One of the umbrellas in the lost-and-found centre at the train station is the Bobobobobone. Shiro is surprised at the number of lost-and-found items. Deca attacks Shiro.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep17
programme.desc: A Dangerous Construction Site - One of the bolts used to build a skyscraper might be the Bobobobobone. Shiro climbs the steel frames but the construction site is dangerous. Will Shiro reach the bolt?

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Bo Bo Bottles - Tomorrow is bottle collection day and traces of the Bobobobobone are found in the bottles. Shiro and Deca try to find the Bobobobobone before it falls into human hands.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Duel At The Corn Field - The Bobobobobone is somewhere in the corn field. It seems like an endless search, but luckily, it's found without much trouble. Deca starts attacking Shiro with a machine.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Cancan Loves The Swing - CanCan wants to go on the swing at the park. Shiro and Deca stand in line just for her. When they finally get to the front, they find traces of the Bobobobobone on the swing.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Trouble At Smelt Fishing - Traces of the Bobobobobone are detected on fish scales by the lake. When Shiro arrives at the frozen lake, he drills a hole in it and competes with Deca at smelt-fishing.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Lunch Time Is Quiet Time - Traces of the Bobobobobone are found at the Nohara family's home. Shiro must retrieve the Bobobobobone while the family naps, making sure no one realises he's a superhero.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Can I Keep It? - After stumbling upon a cute cat-dog-rabbit creature hybrid, or 'Cadobbit', Ben ignores Grandpa Max's advice and sneaks the animal onto the Rustbucket, but is soon in over his head as it turns on him.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Battle At Biggie Box - Ben and Billy Billions go head-to-head over a Sumo Slammer Set sold exclusively inside the world's largest shopping centre, only to find six-year-old Simon Sez has gotten to it first.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Bon Voyage - Aboard the SS Pettigrew on its final voyage, Ben must battle seasickness as well as Steam Smythe, who looks to use his mechanical creatures to sink the steamship's modern replacement.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 Ep5
programme.desc: The 11th Alien, Part 1 - With new Omni-Enhancements in tow, Ben plans on saving a town from a sudden mudslide, but his heroics are short-lived once Vilgax appears to warn him about the Omnitrix's mysterious new alien.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 Ep6
programme.desc: The 11th Alien, Part 2 - After discovering that Vilgax has joined forces with the Weatherheads, Ben must not only overcome his doubts, but must also fully embrace his new powers if he is to beat his foes.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry In New York S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Great Donut Robbery / Torpedon't / Billboard Jumble / Horticulture Clash - Tom and Jerry mistake burglars' loot for a bag of donuts. Tom chases Jerry through a series of surreal billboards, Spike goes overboard trying to make up for manhandling Tom.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry In New York S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Room Service Robots / Coney Island Adventure / Scents And Sensibility / Wrecking Ball - A troop of robot bellhops cause trouble, Tom becomes canine catnip and more.

programme.title: Sesame Street S53 Ep23
programme.desc: Horsing Around - Julia and Sam help Elmo learn to ride a pony at a farm. When its time to ride, Elmo feels nervous. What if he tries belly breathing? It works.

programme.title: Sesame Street S53 Ep24
programme.desc: Move And Groove On Sesame Street - Its Dance Your Favorite Dance Day. Nina, who knows lots of dances from around the world, teaches everyone the moves to their favorite dance.

programme.desc: Theyre cute. Theyre cuddly. Theyre super spies! Your favorite penguins are here to stop villainous Dr. Octavius Brine and save the world.

programme.desc: Follow the minion trio as they venture out into the world to find a new evil boss for their brethren to follow.

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: The Wolf of Wall Street's Jonah Hill and Whiplash's Miles Teller star in this dramedy based on a true story that follows two twenty-something Miami stoners who exploit a little-known government initiative during the Iraq War that allows small businesses to bid on U.S. Military contracts. Starting small, they begin raking in big money and are soon living the high life. But the pair gets in over their heads when they land a $300 million deal to arm the Afghan Military -- a deal that puts them in business with some very shady people, not the least of which turns out to be the U.S. Government. Comedy powerhouse Todd Phillips (The Hangover films) writes, directs and produces (with Bradley Cooper) this incredible true story based on a controversial Rolling Stone article.

programme.title: Deadly Inferno

programme.title: Blood Of Redemption

programme.title: Around The World In 80 Days
programme.desc: It is 1872, and a British inventor, a Chinese thief and a French artist set off to circumnavigate the globe in 80 days. They travel by land, air, sea, and in-line skates in order to beat the clock and finish where they started.

programme.title: Super Eruption

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary Director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s

programme.title: Life Below Zero S11 Ep3
programme.desc: On the Auroras - Alaskans confront the environment, and themselves, as winter bears down.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Hong Kong - Michael begins his adventures in Hong Kong, with railway highlights including the cable funicular to the top of Hong Kong's highest mountain, the Peak, and the enviably efficient and shiny Mass Transit System.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Chiang Mai to the River Kwai - Michael Portillo embarks on a two-part adventure through Thailand. Michael helps out at an elephant hospital, tries his hand at the art of umbrella-making and learns about northern Thai cuisine.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Bangkok to Hua Hin - Michael continues his exploration of Thailand by rail, steered by his 1913 Bradshaw's guide. First, he steps into the ring under the guidance of champion trainer, Master Toddy, to learn Muay Thai boxing. Can he perfect the Cobra inspired right hook?

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ho Chi Minh to Hoi An - Michael Portillo boards Vietnam's spectacular Reunification Railway to make a 1,000-mile journey from Ho Chi Minh City to Hanoi. He visits the container port of Haiphong and finishes in Halong Bay.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Hue to Halong Bay - Michael Portillo travels through the Socialist Republic of Vietnam. Near the formidable imperial city of Hue, Michael meets milliner Mrs Ngo, who teaches him how to make the iconic conical hat.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Jakarta to Borobudur - In the heaving megacity of Jakarta, Michael Portillo uncovers Indonesia's colonial past as part of a Dutch empire and its rich history as a port.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Yogyakarta to Surabaya - Beginning in Java's royal city, Yogyakarta, Michael Portillo visits the Sultan's Palace and witnesses the ancient art of shadow puppetry, known as wayang.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Penang to Cameron Highlands - Michael rides one of the steepest and fastest funicular railways in the world and steps into a tropical paradise as he releases exotic specimens at Malaysia's first butterfly sanctuary.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Kuala Lumpur to Johor Bahru - In Kuala Lumpur, Michael tries the ancient art of pewter smithing and learns how the discovery of tin transformed a muddy estuary into Malaysia's thriving capital.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Singapore - Michael Portillo's railway tour reaches its final stop - Singapore. Michael walks the streets of Chinatown with a local artist and uncovers the history of the Chinese community there.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep7
programme.desc: The World's First Volcano - Nine months after visiting Europe's most active volcano, Etna in Italy, it erupted. Neighbouring volcanoes Stromboli and Vulcano are now also showing signs of imminent eruption.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Brazil - Robson makes his way to South America to meet the marine life of Brazil.

programme.title: Wild China S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Shangri La - With splendour, scale and romance, Wild China lifts the veil on the world's most enigmatic and magnificent country, delving into its vibrant habitats to reveal a land of unbelievable natural complexity. Journey across China from the glittering peaks of the Himalayas to the barren steppe, the sub-Arctic to the tropical islands, through deserts both searingly hot and mind-numbingly cold and see, in pioneering images, a dazzling array of mysterious, beautiful, wild and rare creatures.

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Pacific S1 Ep1
programme.desc: French Polynesia - Martin explores French Polynesia through French baguettes and coral wine, and on a Polynesian outrigger canoe. He swims with sharks, investigates Marlon Brando's wildlife programme, and sails to the remote Marquesas to meet a local horse whisperer.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep7
programme.desc: The World's First Volcano - Nine months after visiting Europe's most active volcano, Etna in Italy, it erupted. Neighbouring volcanoes Stromboli and Vulcano are now also showing signs of imminent eruption.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S7 Ep4
programme.desc: Jaffa Cakes - Gregg Wallace visits a Manchester factory that churns out 6 million Jaffa Cakes every single day.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep3
programme.desc: How can a glass dome be built big enough to house a mountain? What happens when a major railway station is completely taken apart and rebuilt - during the rush hour?

programme.title: Inside the Factory S7 Ep6
programme.desc: Crumpets - Gregg Wallace and Cherry Healey find out how this great British treat is made in a factory that produces 432 million of them every year!

programme.title: Big Little Journeys S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A tiny chameleon faces the journey of a lifetime in a Madagascan forest, and a water vole in Scotland swims across a loch and scales a mountain to find new territory and a mate.

programme.title: Stanley Tucci: Searching for Italy S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Veneto - Stanley Tucci visits the Veneto, home to the 'floating city' of Venice. He explores the ingenuity of the Venetians and their food culture, born from the aquatic environment and global influences.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Volcano - Volcan del Fuego in Guatemala is one of the most 'explosive' volcanoes of them all. To reveal what's happening within the volcano, witness the daring attempt to lower a data gathering probe inside.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Cuba - Alongside Cuban fishermen Robson searches for sardines, tarpons, bonefish, barracudas and grouper fish.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Mesoamerican Reef - The Mesoamerican Reef is a pristine ocean ecosystem- but after decades of overfishing and tourist activity, much of this reef is in jeopardy. These Parks are monitored by Ocean advocates dedicated to maintaining the shark feeding grounds, turtle populations and marine spawning grounds that line this incredible reef system.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Waterhole - Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badgers risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean - Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Florida - Florida is famous for its sandy shoresand theres plenty to go around. Florida has the most tidal shoreline of any state in the continental USA. These ocean-side playgrounds are also critical habitats for threatened and endangered species.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Mexico - The mythology of Mexicos Yucatan Peninsula includes a protective Earth Mother figure, Ixchel, who brings fertility and healing to the region. In the shadow of Ixchel, we witness an ancient birthing ritual happening yearly on Mexican beaches: mother green sea turtles haul themselves onto the sands and bury their clutches of eggs.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Skies - Take to the sky to soar with the Bald Eagle. From Cape Bretons Bras dOr Lake, to the birds overwintering home in the Annapolis Valley, the Eagles raise families, hunt and forage for food, and compete for territory with another bird of prey, the Osprey.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cook Islands/ Kki 'Airani - Travel to the Cook Islands, the destination of choice for 3,000 humpback whales ready to mate and raise their young. Witness giant clams and green turtles thriving in the islands massive coral reef and get a glimpse into our evolutionary past.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creepiest Crawlies - New Zealands isolated islands are famed as an unusual paradise, home to a variety of unique wildlife. Best known for its flightless birds, ancient reptiles and coastal mammals, a closer look reveals another world. A land of miniature monsters, Lilliputian predators and tiny terrors that lead remarkable lives, where every hunter is also the hunted and survival is always a giant struggle. Journey into the undergrowth and discover life on a different scale. From giant carnivorous centipedes and nocturnal crickets to fishing spiders and glowing worms with silken traps. Weird and wonderful, these unsung heroes are Wildest New Zealands Creepiest Crawlies.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Bonaire National Marine Park - Deep in the South Caribbean Sea, explore the protected waters of Bonaire National Marine Park, home to thriving reefs, endangered sea turtles, sprawling mangroves, and a plethora of marine life.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Mesoamerican Reef - The Mesoamerican Reef is a pristine ocean ecosystem- but after decades of overfishing and tourist activity, much of this reef is in jeopardy. These Parks are monitored by Ocean advocates dedicated to maintaining the shark feeding grounds, turtle populations and marine spawning grounds that line this incredible reef system.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Waterhole - Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badgers risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean - Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Florida - Florida is famous for its sandy shoresand theres plenty to go around. Florida has the most tidal shoreline of any state in the continental USA. These ocean-side playgrounds are also critical habitats for threatened and endangered species.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Mexico - The mythology of Mexicos Yucatan Peninsula includes a protective Earth Mother figure, Ixchel, who brings fertility and healing to the region. In the shadow of Ixchel, we witness an ancient birthing ritual happening yearly on Mexican beaches: mother green sea turtles haul themselves onto the sands and bury their clutches of eggs.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cook Islands/ Kki 'Airani - Travel to the Cook Islands, the destination of choice for 3,000 humpback whales ready to mate and raise their young. Witness giant clams and green turtles thriving in the islands massive coral reef and get a glimpse into our evolutionary past.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Tricksters - The animal kingdom is filled with mimicry, transformation, and trickery. Discover how stick bugs, lion fish, emperor scorpions, and chameleons use camouflage and confusion to deceive.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Bonaire National Marine Park - Deep in the South Caribbean Sea, explore the protected waters of Bonaire National Marine Park, home to thriving reefs, endangered sea turtles, sprawling mangroves, and a plethora of marine life.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Mesoamerican Reef - The Mesoamerican Reef is a pristine ocean ecosystem- but after decades of overfishing and tourist activity, much of this reef is in jeopardy. These Parks are monitored by Ocean advocates dedicated to maintaining the shark feeding grounds, turtle populations and marine spawning grounds that line this incredible reef system.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep4

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Dino - T-Rex and chickens seem to be as different as they can be, but they more in common that you might think. Recent research reveals that some of our favorite dinosaurs were very birdlike, and that birds are an extant kind of dinosaurs.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Turtle Beach - Locals call it the arribada, or arrival. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Wild West - Complete the trips final lap in the untamed lands where Australias interior desert meets the hot, hostile Indian Ocean. Confront the challenges of survival in this region as Lizzie dives with tiger sharks, manta rays, and nomadic turtles.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Wild Coast - Go up against Australias wiliest gladiators and their impressive arsenals. Learn if these weapons, such as the kangaroos deadly boxing moves and the redback spiders precision-engineered traps, can help them survive the ravages of climate change.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Australian Spring Fever - Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Pollinators - The Annapolis Valley is the Wild Wild Easts most important agricultural center. We dive into the hive to explore the complex social structures of hardworking honeybees. The Monarch butterfly has traveled all the way from Mexico to feed off the local milkweed.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Chemical Weapons - Keep your distance from these natural-born killers. Armed with venom and other poisonous tools that make hunting easier (and escape impossible), nudibranches, cuttlefish, giant centipedes, and assassin bugs are all dressed to kill.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Secret Life of the Crocodiles - Lurking in the waterways of Queensland and the Northern Territory live the largest living reptiles on Earth; theyre among the most dangerous animals in Australia. Crocodiles are formidable predators, superbly adapted to aquatic life, with skull crushing jaws and lightning speed. They were on earth long before the dinosaurs, and have outlived them by millions of years. Now theyre protected in Australia and their numbers have surged in recent years.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 Ep10
programme.desc: The Pantanal - The Pantanal is one of the worlds great reservoirs for plant and animal life. Scientists estimate that its home to 80 species of mammals, 650 species of birds, 50 species of reptiles, and over 300 species of fish. Its the largest tropical wetland on Earth, yet its also one of the most unforgiving habitats to call home.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jungle River - Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs - Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep10
programme.desc: The Case Of The Slippery Stage - Pat-Pat is meant to be giving a baton twirling display at the Town Hall but the stage is covered with sticky stuff. Clockwork Mouse and Carlton can clear up the sticky stuff but Noddy must investigate to find out who was trying to spoil Pat-Pat's show or they might do it again! Using his wwwbook to follow all the clues from polishing day at the Fairy Castle to Fairy Coco swapping the polish for a ribbon, Noddy works out it was Pat-Pat who tried to delay her show. She wanted to practise more! Noddy and Bumpy help Pat-Pat to feel confident about the performance and she gives a great display. Thanks, Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep10
programme.desc: Why Tickbird Sits On Hippos Back - You see there was a time when Tickbird didn't sit on Hippo's back, infact they weren't friends at all! Tickbird was sick of Hippo splashing all the time. One day tiny Tickbird challenges big Hippo to a contest who can drink the most water in a single gulp! Tickbird outwits Hippo by using the tides and from that day she is allowed to sit on Hippo's back and pick off all the yummy ticks she can eat! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep10
programme.desc: FB's Sleepover - FB is excited about his sleepover with the other cars in the workshop but when the night draws in he is unsure of his unfamiliar surroundings. Big Chris helps set him at his ease

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep10
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Painted Sheep - Pat has got to deliver special cans of blue dye for Alf to mark up his cheeky runaway sheep. That way, when they get out, he can work out which sheep belong to him! Meanwhile, the kids are having a special delivery service day of their own as Ben gives them a tour of the Sorting Office. It's not much fun as Ben won't let them touch anything and when they do, they cause chaos! Meanwhile, Alf's sheep have runaway and Pat can't find either them or Alf! By using the tracking device on Alf's phone and deputising the kids to be act as special delivery deputies, Pat is eventually able to locate Alf and the runaway sheep! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep17
programme.desc: Mecha-Menace - Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep43
programme.desc: Bridge - A group of Trux displaced by a volcano comes to Ty for help, and the gang has to work together to build a bridge to welcome their new guests.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep43
programme.desc: Desserted Island/Dry Spell - The crew gets stranded on a candy-filled mystery island; Burn isn't herself after a losing streak so the crew goes to extreme lengths to help her win.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep43
programme.desc: Only The Lucky Survive / Shar-Squad - Tip tricks Oh into thinking he's invincible to convince him to go on a dangerous adventure/Sharzod takes revenge when she loses her squad to her arch-rival Fance

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep39
programme.desc: Lucky and the Wayward Wedding - Jim and Kate are getting married... or are they?

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep40
programme.desc: Lucky and the Railroad Ransom - When Butch LePray hold Jim for ransom, Lucky and Spirit team up with the unlikeliest of allies to get her father back

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep35
programme.desc: Zero Dunk Thunky / Pie Vs Pie - Thunk is captured by the Broods and develops feelings for Blurg /At the Valley's food competition, Thunk and Ugga mistakenly make a new hit food

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep36
programme.desc: Super Smash Siblings / A Hole In Grug - Eep and Thunk compete against their classmates in Ahhh-Smashin/After being denied a spot on the Valley's Wall of Fame, Grug creates a new game

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep9
programme.desc: Out of the Cave and Onto Thin Ice - After a shocking revelation, Po is determined to get his chi back and Jing decides to face Jindiao

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep11
programme.desc: Unholy Dragon Returns to the Mountains - Jindiao takes Po and the kids hostage in an attempt to locate the Wellspring

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep10
programme.desc: Return of the Four Constellations - The kids go to the Spirit Realm and meet the Original Four Constellations in the hopes of learning how to defeat Jindiao

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Horrible Hostilities of the Homework Hydra - When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harolds latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep48
programme.desc: Teambuilding - The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep1
programme.desc: Scooter Buskie - The worlds worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep49
programme.desc: Theo 100 - With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep69
programme.desc: Loyal Order Of Ingerman - After learning that his ancestors once hunted dragons Fishlegs goes out on a journey to find a Dramillion dragon while being faced with the challenge to clear his family name.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep17
programme.desc: Trolly Tales 2 / Rainbowmageddon - The Trolls try to entertain and win over Archer Pastry with a series of Troll stories/When a rainbow over Troll Village begins to experience a catastrophic breakdown, Cloud Guy arrives in the village to offer his assistance

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep69
programme.desc: Tears In The Drain - When Detective King Julien searches for a missing Butterfish he notices lemurs acting strange all around and realizes he has a serious mystery on his hands so he must get the Mystery Solving Team back together
