programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep7
programme.desc: Tears Of Balmera - Hunk and Coran search for a new power crystal on a living planet inhabited by an alien race imprisoned by Zarkon.Back at the Castle, Pidge sabotages Sendak's efforts to steal Voltron.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep8
programme.desc: Taking Flight - Team Voltron responds to a distress call and stops to help a stranded band of freedom fighters on the run from Zarkon.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep7
programme.desc: The Dark Side of the Moose: Chapter Two - Rocky and Bullwinkle encounter a young alien and set out on a mission to reunite him with his alien family but things get complicated when they accidentally lose him at an alien convention and Boris, Natasha and other eccentric billionaire Colonel Boudreaux are also after him

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep8
programme.desc: The Dark Side of the Moose: Chapter Three - A super-powered Rocky almost defeats Fearless Leader, but accidentally overdoes it, driving Fearless Leader to take his powers into space for the ultimate space take-over-the-world evil plan

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep35
programme.desc: Tree House / Queen Hatshepsut - When Sherman invites Johnny Appleseed to the show to grow a forest and build his dream treehouse, Peabody tries to prevent a chaotic woodland invasion

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep36
programme.desc: This Is Your Life? / Robert Edwin Peary - When Sherman has to pick someone for his school project, he and Peabody help Hobson do everything on his life bucket list live on the show

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep5
programme.desc: Creepy Caterpillar/Code of Silence - When Twig introduces Leaf to his new caterpillar friend Josh, Leaf must overcome his debilitating fear of caterpillars in order to give Josh a chance. / Hot tempered Rabbit is sick of the noise from the Mighty Ones games, so he makes them a bet that they cant go for a whole day without making a sound. Desperate to see them fail, Rabbit spends the entire day making secret attempts to get the Mighty Ones to talk.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep6
programme.desc: Bug Zapper/The Helper - When Mr. Ladybug finds the new bug zapper the Humans installed to be irresistible, the Mighty Ones try creating distractions to keep him from zapping himself. / When Rabbit realizes Rocksy is great at "conflict management," he tricks her into helping him strongarm other yard denizens in order to get what he wants.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep3
programme.desc: Vienna Voice-Versa - When Whitebeard attempts to magically enhance his voice for a singing duet with an old Wizard friend, he accidentally switches bodies with Arf. Now, with Dog-Whitebeard stalling the show, it's up to Wally and Wenda to reverse the mix-up before the concert.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep32
programme.desc: Lucky and the Ghostly Gotcha! - When Snips claims not to be afraid of ghosts, the PALs decide to give him a fun Halloween scare hell never forget!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep33
programme.desc: Munk History / Happy Howl Day - Grug tries to solve the mystery of where Munk's family is /Eep refuses to join in when Ahhh! Valley celebrates their first holiday, Howl Day

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep32
programme.desc: A Grim Retreat - The Riders head to a tropical island for fun in the sun, not realizing it's infested with Grimora Leeches which drives their dragons to turn on them.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep33
programme.desc: Escape From Krinkle's - Boss has an opportunity to get his old job back at Baby Corp;but to get the interview;hell need the playgroup babies to help him escape Marsha Krinkles super-safe Bubbeezee playroom. Tim nearly misses Kabob Day at school.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep32
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Savage Spite of the Slimy Salamangler - Krupp's campers take on rich rivals in a hoity-toity boat race that also features a revenge-obsessed giant salamander. Paging Captain Underpants!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep6
programme.desc: The Lost City - With a map from the comic book, Po and Blade make the treacherous journey through the desert to the lost city, and once inside they find the guardian of the fire whip, Rukhmini. The mysterious figure, a stag named Colin, forges an uneasy alliance with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep32
programme.desc: Scrap to the Future / Bringing Up Birdy - As shes preparing for the Hearts & Crafts Festival, Poppy finds a mysterious scrapbook that seems to predict the future and it shows the festival being a disaster! She and Branch set out to prevent the predictions from coming true. But is there a downside to being over prepared?/When a nest full of just-hatched baby birds imprint on Branch, he must overcome his fear of birds in order to raise them right.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep32
programme.desc: The Jungle Games - After making a bet against Uncle King Julien, King Julien must win the "Jungle Games" in order to maintain control of the royal crown.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep32
programme.desc: Escape Goat - Dulcinea and the entire town must save the day after Puss attempts to rescue Uli with the help of El Guante Blanco, Golem, Goodsword and the Dutchess.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep32
programme.desc: Mongolia-saurus - The Wanderers receive a WanderPost with some odd news from paleontologist, WIZARD AMBER: living dinosaurs are roaming around Mongolia! Odlulu and Fritz are using the DINO KEY to get the ultimate pets: real dinosaurs! So Wally and Wenda must use their dino-knowledge to wrangle these prehistoric animals before they overrun all of Mongolia.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep10
programme.desc: Longest Yardwork / The Girl Who Cried Goose - Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. The team try to transform this jungle into a backyard just in time for the party. / Lula finds an angry goose on the loose, and Team Zenko need to get it out of the park before soccer camp starts.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep6
programme.desc: A Ball-For-All - It's Ball-entines Day, the day when the dogs of Pawston show their affection for each other by exchanging balls. But unfortunately, the town is fresh out, so Tag and Scooch set sail for Ball Island. \ If Tag and Scooch want to leave Ball Island with the balls they chose for their family, they must earn them by proving themselves ball-worthy, through a series of challenges from The Fetcher.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep11
programme.desc: The Case Of The Broken Toy Wash - Fuse is heartbroken when his new special toy wash is broken. Right before Revs could have a wash in it too! Noddy decides to investigate and help the little robot find out who has broken it. Using all his investigating skills and collecting evidence with the WhoWhatWhere Tablet Noddy realises that it's his own best beloved car, Revs, who broke the toy wash! Poor Revs thought that if he went through the toy wash he'd miss his special time with Noddy and Bumpy. Noddy finds a way for Revs to enjoy the toy wash AND still has his special playtime with his best friends. Clever Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep11
programme.desc: Why Frog Croaks - You see there was a time when Frog didn't croak. Frog sang like a bird and the birds didn't like it. Birds were the masters of song and that's the way it should be! So the birds trick poor old Frog into a singing duel and sing and sing and sing until poor old Frog's voice is reduced to a rebbit. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep11
programme.desc: Cici Spectacular - Mr Carburettor has asked CiCi to perform one of her stunts in front of a big crowd. CiCi is very nervous and Roary does his best to help his friend prepare for the event.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep11
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Eco Igloo - Mrs Goggins is spearheading a recycling initiative A Greener Greendale but has been overwhelmed by donations of plastic bottles and compost. Meanwhile, Pat picks up today's special delivery - blocks of ice to make an igloo at the school for their North Pole project. Pat and Ajay struggle to get the slippery blocks into PAT2, then Pat and Jess must endure a journey with the air-con on full blast to keep the blocks frozen. Despite this, the ice starts to melt on the way to the Schoolhouse. PC Selby is getting concerned by the overflowing recycling and deems it a traffic hazard. Ted and Alf help collect the recycling early but some of the plastic bottles spill onto the road, causing a road jam that blocks Pat. By the time he gets the blocks to the schoolhouse there is nothing left but tiny ice cubes. The children are disappointed but Pat remembers thinking the plastic bottles in the road earlier were ice. He and Ted unload the recycling and Lauren and the children use the plastic bottles to make a much warmer igloo instead. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep12
programme.desc: The Case Of The Dazzle Dragon - Everyone in Fable Fields is very worried that a new Dazzle Dragon has appeared in the land. Big Ears says there's no such thing as a Dragon in Toyland so Noddy decides to investigate. All the evidence seems to lead to a dragon footprints, loud noises and glimpses of shiny scales in the woods but clever Noddy thinks it through and, using his investigating skills of looking and looking again, soon realises that the dragon' isn't a dragon at all! It's the knights out on patrol in their shiny armour and tight formation! Phew! Thanks Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep12
programme.desc: Why Spider Has A Tiny Waist - You see there was a time when Spider didn't have a tiny waist. She was all big and round and did she like her food! One day greedy Spider hears of Four Feasts in Tinga Tinga and she wanted to go to them all! So she spun four threads and attached them to various animals going to the feasts. But the Monkeys, Frog, Hippo and the Bees all set off in different directions North, South, East and West and Spider's thread soon runs out. EEeeek! The threads get tighter and tighter and tighter, making Spider's smaller and smaller and smaller! Luckily the threads break, but from that day on Spider has always had a tiny waist. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep12
programme.desc: Cry Cold - Big Chris is feeling ill so Marsha sends him to bed until he is better. Big Chris enjoys the attention rather too much and fails to let everyone know when he is on the mend.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep12
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Reckless Rollers - Pat is delivering some new car wash rollers to Ted, but the locks on his van doors are faulty. As Pat negotiates an obstruction in the road, the van doors fly open and the rollers fly into a field of startled sheep! Integrating them into their flock, the sheep make off with them, and Pat and Jess take chase, creating more chaos on the roads. Meanwhile, PC Selby has arrived at the car wash, eager to get the panda car cleaned for his date with Dr Gilbertson. Unable to help, Ted engages him in conversation about roadblocks - and PC Selby begins erecting them all over the garage forecourt! Having finally retrieved his Special Delivery, Pat calls PC Selby, who immediately packs up his roadblocks and takes them where they're needed. After a little interruption from the cheeky sheep, the roads are safe and PC Selby escorts Pat back to the carwash. Pat and PC Selby help Ted fit his new rollers and Pat becomes his first car wash customer!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep18
programme.desc: Summer Holiday - In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep44

programme.desc: Pups Save the Butterflies / Pups Save an Underground Chicken - Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and mysterious butterflies are causing chaos all around Adventure Bay! // The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay's underground tunnel system.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep803
programme.desc: Pups Save a Clown - The Pups must save Humdinger and his kittens when they mess around with Toodles the Clown's tiny clown car.

Because Rubble & Crew build a bridge to help him get to the other side!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep805
programme.desc: Pups Save The Mustache - The Pups must help to find Mayor Humdinger's mustache after he accidentally shaves it off before it's about to be on the cover of a magazine.

programme.desc: Pups Save a Bookmobile / Pups Save Heady Humdinger - When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep120
programme.desc: The Crew and Chase Are On The Case - There's a mystery afoot in Builder Cove! When the sculpture of all the townsfolk suddenly disappears, Chase joins Rubble & Crew to solve the case of the missing statue...and build a brand new Science Center to help investigate.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep126

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep309

programme.desc: Big Bro Theodore / No Putts, No Glory - When Theodore mistakenly thinks he's the oldest brother, he tries to be a better role model for Alvin and Simon. // Alvin tricks Theodore into believing he's great at mini golf which backfires when Theo signs up for a tournament.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Granny Awards / Sick Day - Dave is thrilled when he thinks he's nominated for a Grammy, but it's actually an award for aging musicians. // Alvin and Kevin pretend to be sick to miss school and sneak off to the Dagarack Convention.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep179
programme.desc: Extreme Sports / Squirrel Record - SpongeBob and Patrick try to join the extreme sports team The Drasticals. // Sandy finds a book of worlds records, and tries to break them all with SpongeBobs help.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep109
programme.desc: To Dad and Back / Survivoring - Patrick ventures inside Cecil to learn how the body works. // Cecil takes his kids camping, but Squidina wants the drama of reality TV.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep180
programme.desc: Patrick-Man! / Gary's New Toy - Patrick becomes the superhero Patrick-Man, who intends to clean up Bikini Bottomwhether it wants it or not. // Gary becomes obsessed with his new red ball, forcing SpongeBob to take drastic measures to intervene.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Dad's Stache Stash - Cecil shows Patrick his mustache collection.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep107
programme.desc: What About Meep? / Hard Time Out - When an unsatisfied anchovy strays from his brothers, SpongeBob and Patrick must help him find his true identity. // SpongeBob is sent to time out on behalf of his buddy, so Patrick does what he can to rectify the situation.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep501
programme.desc: Schooled! Part 1 - Lincoln tries to swap middle school classes after being separated from the gang, but ends up being transferred to Canada. Lori doesn't fit in on any of the college dorm floors. Mom and Dad rush to potty train Lily for preschool.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep503
programme.desc: The Boss Maybe / Family Bonding - Now the oldest in the house, Leni struggles to follow in Lori's footsteps as the family's babysitter. // Secret agents Lincoln and Clyde investigate the Loud's suspicious new neighbors.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Strife of the Party / Kernel of Truth - When Lola learns that Lana is planning their joint birthday, she does everything to stop it. // Lincoln and the Middle School Action News Team solve the mystery of the missing popcorn.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Fandom Pains / Rita Her Rights - Lucy is annoyed that Lori and Leni have started watching her vampire show because of a cute new character. // After getting community service for racking up tickets, Mom finds it's more relaxing than being at home.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep273
programme.desc: There Will Be Grease! - Mr. Krabs and Plankton must work together after discovering a well of miracle-grease under their restaurants.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Neptune's Ball - The star family visits King Neptune's palace.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep276
programme.desc: Say 'Awww!' - Frustrated that he's seen as cute instead of evil, Plankton builds a robot to punish anyone who says "aww!"

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep244
programme.desc: Pineapple RV - SpongeBob and Patrick turn the pineapple into a mobile home to take Squidward on the road trip he deserves.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep100
programme.desc: Stanley S. Squarepants - When Stanley, SpongeBob's klutzy cousin, comes to visit Bikini Bottom, he quickly turns SpongeBob's life upside down.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Finders Weepers - Ronnie and Sid have to decide whether they "borrow" money from a lost coin purse they found in the mercado.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Going Overboard - Ronnie Anne begs Tio Carlos to teach her some moves when she finds out he is a famous skateboarder.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Gossip Girl - When a Sid secret is leaked at school, Ronnie Anne and Sid wonder if they can continue being best buds!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Battle of the Grandpas / Prankaversary - When Frida's fun dad comes to visit, Hector tries to win back his grandchildren's attention. // Ronnie Anne and Lincoln are set for a big day of pranks and newbie Sid wants to join in on the fun too!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Zoo-mergency! - After a zoo fundraiser goes wrong, Sid must save the day with her family!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Just Be Coo / Tee'd Off - When Sancho gets himself into trouble in the city, Sergio helps him become a model pet! // Worried that Lori may have a new crush, Bobby visits her in college and tries to impress her with his golf skills.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep243
programme.desc: The Nitwitting / The Ballad of Filthy Muck - Patrick inducts SpongeBob into his prestigious society of dullards and doofuses. // Patrick takes his grime to a new extreme, playing around in so much trash that he becomes unrecognizable.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep244
programme.desc: The Krusty Slammer / Pineapple RV - Mr. Krabs turns the Krusty Krab into a jailhouse after Plankton breaks the law, but crime only pays for so long. // SpongeBob and Patrick turn the pineapple into a mobile home to take Squidward on the road trip he deserves.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep245
programme.desc: Gary's Got Legs / King Plankton - Gary is given a set of limbs to keep up with SpongeBob, but soon makes his owner look sluggish by comparison. // Plankton practices ruling the world by shrinking himself down and declaring himself king of SpongeBob's aquarium.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep216
programme.desc: Cave Dwelling Sponge / The Clam Whisperer - When a prehistoric Sponge is unfrozen, he causes chaos all over town - and only SpongeBob can communicate with him! // When a flock of clams descend on Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob has to get them out before they ruin the whole town!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep217
programme.desc: Spot Returns / The Check-Up - When his pet amoeba Spot has puppies, Plankton decides to use them in another of his nefarious plots. // Mr. Krabs is too scared to get his physical, but if he doesn't pass, the Krusty Krab will be shut down!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep153
programme.desc: Accidents Will Happen - When Squidward gets hurt at work, he threatens legal action unless Mr. Krabs agrees to cater to him hand and foot.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Crane On A Wire - Po tries to help Crane get his 'mojo' back after Crane is humiliated at a charity event.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Shifu's Back - When Shifu throws out his back, Po has to sit in as master of the Jade Palace.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Blind Bandit - In search for an Earthbending teacher for Aang, the kids go to an underground Earthbending tournament where they encounter Toph, a blind, but powerful Earthbender.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Best Laid Plaintains - It's a special day when Bada and Bing get a shipment of delicious plantains to eat. Although they jealously guard the African bananas, King Julien's determined to taste them too.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Best Foes / Night of the Vesuviuses - Kowalski invents an enemy detector but it doesn't work. Old enemies are now friends & old friends are now enemies. // The annual Zoo Snooze is here! This year the Vesuvius Twins buy up all the tickets. The zoosters plan to exact revenge on the twins.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Operation: Lunacorn Apocalypse - The Penguins are faced with a World Domination battle when Private accidentally unleashes KuchiKukhan the Destroyer of Worlds. Can they stop him in time to save the World?

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Mayor Ariel - As Mayor Peeve announces his re-election campaign, Ariel returns to the mountain and runs against him for mayor.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep202
programme.desc: The Cave of Two Lovers - On their way to Omashu, the kids meet a group of nomads who show them a short cut through the 'cave of two lovers'.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Swamp - When the kids end up in a mysterious and strange swamp, their fears are exposed. And Aang learns about being "connected to the Earth" from an unlikely teacher.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep123
programme.desc: That Sinkhole Feeling / Like a Brother - Best and Bester get too carried away when tasked with commercializing Bettervale's most beguiling natural wonder. // Diamondo is used to getting everything he wants, and decides what he wants is a sibling, just like Best and Bester.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Funny Money / Shaking Bad - When Best breaks the last clean plate, rather than do the dishes, Best and Bester head out to buy a brand new one. // Best and Bester decide to make the best milkshake ever, only to find themselves in a bitter contest with Flip Flop.

programme.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Birthday Police - When Scissors lies about Rock's birthday to get free cake, the trio must go on the run from the Birthday Police.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Nothing But Truffle - After a bizarre transformation, Mikey and Meat Sweats become BFFs.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Shadow of Evil - As the TMNT work to lure Baron Draxum out, Splinter tries to get to the bottom of odd goings-on at April's new job.

programme.title: Wallykazam! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Castle Cafe - When hungry customers pour into Wally's pretend restaurant, Wally and friends turn it into a real restaurant and try to keep the customers satisfied.

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep105
programme.desc: There's Only One Bozzly / Cousin Flugtilda - When Bozzly gets hurt, Melvin steps in as Abby's sidekick. // Princess Flug's Cousin Flugtilda comes to visit, and Priness Flug worries that eveyone likes her cousin more than they like her.

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Chef Curly / Afraid of Cats - Chef Jeff is preparing for a big dinner and needs Curly to stay out of his way. // Melvin gets a new cat, and Abby learns that Fuzzlys are afraid of cats.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep84
programme.desc: Spy Buddies / Boat Smarts / Good Old Whatshisname - Determined to uncover Planktons next plot, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob and Patrick to spy on him. // Watch an instructional video on boating techniques with Squidward and SpongeBob. // Mr. Krabs holds a contest for his employees.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep85
programme.desc: New Digs / Krabs a la Mode - After arriving one minute late for work, SpongeBob decides to move into the Krusty Krab so that he will never be late again. // When Plankton secretly turns down the thermostat at the Krusty Krab the entire restaurant freezes over.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep86

programme.title: Landline Ep1

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Greg Jennett brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep31
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Launceston 1922 Sub Station Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - Mark and Karen Bartkevicius are passionate about local history. So passionate they're poised to restore and convert a local icon - an old electric substation, perched high overlooking the city of Launceston in Tasmania.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - My Garden Pa - Laura Skates Ep16
programme.desc: Sr. 32 - Meet botanist and PhD candidate Laura Skates who has been looking at the appetite of some of our most unique plant species.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep43
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep21
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters cover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The Business Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: The World Ep25
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - At the new earlier time of 9pm AEDT, get to know what's going on in your world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with expert guests.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep31
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and comprehensive coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Back Roads - Timber Creek, NT Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Back Roads heads to Timber Creek in the Top End where guest presenter Kristy O'Brien finds an unlikely partnership is creating positive spin offs for the town and meets locals who've found love in the most unexpected places.

programme.title: Australian Story - Force of Nature - Gina Chick Ep19
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Her unconventional approach to surviving in the wild captured the public imagination. Now reality TV star Gina Chick shares how connecting with nature helped her through unimaginable loss.

programme.title: Leigh Sales in conversation with Gina Chick - Leigh Sales in conversation with Gina Chick Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Leigh Sales sits down with wilderness warrior Gina Chick for a fascinating conversation about her barefoot childhood, preparing for reality TV show Alone Australia, and old friend Hugh Jackman.

programme.title: Heywire - Zac from Mildura, VIC Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Heywire winner Zac is a proud young Barkinji man. Dancing with his father and uncle on country connects him with his ancestors and culture.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep31
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Know the latest on the day's top stories, as Jade Barker brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.desc: Sr. 31 - Sophie Thomson meets a productive gardener on Kangaroo Island, Tino Carnevale visits the home garden of a botanists, Josh Byrne demystifies greywater and we meet Claire Hooper, a comedian with a horticultural background.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep31
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Follow the story with the latest on today's news, explaining what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe covering what you need to know. Presented by Jade Barker in Perth.

programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.desc: Sr. 31 - Sophie Thomson visits a eucalyptus oil farm, Costa Georgiadis reworks a banana circle, Tino Carnevale explores a home-grown arboretum, and we visit the home of an interior stylist whose indoor plant collection will amaze you.

programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Cormack investigates the link between Ezekiel's missing cousins, the lost boys, and Isabel's murder.

programme.title: Things That Made Australia - Gold Ep4

programme.title: The Great Australian Bee Challenge Ep1

programme.desc: Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: On The Wings 5Min. Ep6054
programme.desc: 001 - Journey through the air on virtual excursions from Tokyo Haneda to regional airports all over Japan. This time it's New Ishigaki Airport; islands in an emerald sea from over 40,000ft.

programme.title: Spiritual Explorers Ep2088
programme.desc: 021 - Explore the spirituality of kumidaiko, an ensemble of Japanese taiko drums featuring intricate and thunderous beats with dynamic choreography.

programme.title: Framing Everyday Moments Ep6041
programme.desc: 001 - A unique time-lapse photography project. Shot by pros and non-pros from around the world, on the transience of nature, celestial phenomena, cityscapes and each single moment of everyday life.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Ramen Japan 5Min. Ep6055
programme.desc: 001 - A gourmet tour of ramen all around Japan. This time: the birthplace of tonkotsu, Fukuoka. Looking at three different styles, we'll learn this ramen's secrets, and the story of its creation.

programme.title: Direct Talk Ep2105
programme.desc: 081 - John Kaizan Neptune is one of the world's leading players of the shakuhachi, a type of Japanese bamboo flute. He talks about making his own instruments and what the shakuhachi can teach us about life.

programme.title: Where We Call Home Ep2087
programme.desc: 113 - This time, we follow three Ukrainians - a teenage boy and a female entrepreneur who both came to Japan thanks to martial arts, as well as man who works in PR for a vertical farming company.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep906EdwardsvsDiaz
programme.desc: Fan favorite Nate Diaz returned to action taking on surging welterweight contender Leon Rocky Edwards at UFC 263. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their battle in front of a packed house in Glendale, Arizona.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep501BryceMitchellGigaChikadzeHenriHooftCirylGane
programme.desc: Arkansas' Bryce Mitchell tells us what it means to be a home-grown fighter, Giga Chikadze breaks down his most lethal striking moves, Henri Hooft gives an insight into his career in the corner of the worlds best fighters, and we join Interim Heavyweight Champ Ciryl Gane on a media tour around his home city of Paris.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC280OliveiravsMakhachev
programme.desc: UFC 280 featured a battle for the vacant lightweight title between former champion Charles Oliveira and Islam Makhachev. Plus, Aljamain Sterling defended his bantamweight belt against TJ Dillashaw. See the whole main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep5
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep5
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Hermansson vs. Pyfer
programme.desc: Prelims - Philadelphia finisher Joe Pyfer went viral with his knockout win on Dana Whites Contender Series, and after three more big wins in the Octagon, he will make his first main event appearance at the APEX in Las Vegas on February 11 against perennial middleweight contender Jack Hermansson. With Pyfer sporting a 92 percent finish rate and Hermansson ending 17 of his 23 wins before the final horn, the odds are strong that this UFC Fight Night headliner wont be going the distance, and that has fight fans eagerly anticipating this 185-pound showdown

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Dolidze vs. Imavov
programme.desc: Prelims - The second month of 2024 will get off to a rousing start in the Octagon, as middleweight contenders Roman Dolidze and Nassourdine Imavov collide in the five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas on Saturday, February 4. A Georgian powerhouse whose last three wins have seen him knock out Kyle Daukaus, Phil Hawes and Jack Hermansson, Dolidze will be seeking another highlight reel finish against Imavov, who holds victories over the likes of Edmen Shahbazyan and Joaquin Buckley
